alert.note: Alert for East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Far Northeast Highlands (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 13 at 11:59AM MST until December 13 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MST THIS EVENING... ...HIGH WIND WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT NOON MST TODAY... * WHAT...Winds have decreased somewhat this morning, however, west winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph are expected. Winds will likely be strongest between 2 PM and 4 PM MST. * WHERE...East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains and Far Northeast Highlands, including the Interstate 25 corridor. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects, including inflatable holiday decorations. Tree limbs may be blown down. Expect strong crosswinds on north to south oriented roadways.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Far Northeast Highlands
